title: Looking for Mid For Ranked 5's Team
body:
Shadows of Valhalla are looking for a Mid. We're looking for dedicated and ambitious people. We practice 2-3 times a week and aim to have more practices as the team progresses. We operate around EST (Eastern Standard Time) so it would be preferable if you lived within that timezone. Our practices start at 6PM and run to 10-11PM usually. Individual practice is expected in between practices. (Practice times can be changed to fit the schedule of everyone on the team.)

Feel free to add any additional information you think is necessary to the application. Add me in-game if you have any questions, but I ask that you post an application first before you message me.

----Requirements----
18+ Years old (Please be out of highschool)
Skype/Curse
Mic
Positive attitude
Not going on tilt
Gold 3 and Higher

----Application----
Rank:
Top 3 champs:
What can you bring to the team?:

replies.body:
Rank: Diamond 5
Top 3 champs: Azir, Ziggs, Anivia (As of recent). Also proficient on Cassiopeia, Xerath, Ahri, Leblanc.
What can you bring to the team?: Consistent gameplay, rare deaths, skillful and knowledgable performance on champs.

age: 25
Rank: Silver 1 (I took a 6 month Hiatus from League I use to be Gold 1)
Top 3 Mid Champs: Anivia, Brand, Wukong
Strengths: great at solo lanes
Weaknesses: Sometimes i get tunnel vision
What can I bring to the team: just having fun and not getting too stressed out about games.

Age: 23
Rank: Plat IV
Top 3 champs: Annie, Veigar, Talon, Kassadin
Strength: Lane pressure and roaming
Weakness: Been spamming solo que will need to adjust to team play. Zed.
What can you bring to the team?: Willing and wanting to adjust my play to a more team oriented style. Very good at taking criticism into other games and fixing my mistakes.

Rank: Plat 5
Top 3 Champs: Azir, Ori, Viktor
What can you bring to the team?: Desire to win, good teamfighting and decision making, willingness to learn shotcalling

Rank:G3
Top 3 champs: Leblanc, Lulu, Orianna
What can you bring to the team?: Positive attitude/ confidence in lane. Teamwork/striving to be better. Not giving up games if you miss objectives/ that every game can be won.

Age: 22
Curse.
Rank: G2
Top 3 champs: {{champion:103}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:245}} 
What can you bring to the team?: Wards, some decent shot calls and consistency.
